response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. The product offers unparalleled benefits and efficiency, tailored specifically to meet your unique needs. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a competitive advantage. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can provide more information to assist you in making your decision.", "product_price": 950000}
